pages.text: Spectres are creatures like Phantoms but they are ethereal and peaceful too. They can phase throught blocks and only take magic damage.$(br2)Players can attach a Lead to a Spectre to travel with it. They are fast than $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/endergrade)Endergrades$(/l) but the player cannot control where the Spectre travels to. Sneaking or interacting with the Lead will detach the player.
Spectres may be attracted holding a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/soul_vulture)Soul Heart$(/l).
